title: Köhnə Xudat Azerbaijan: Exploring the Forgotten Ruins of an Ancient Caspian Settlement
description: Köhnə Xudat Azerbaijan: Exploring the Forgotten Ruins of an Ancient Caspian SettlementKöhnə Xudat in Azerbaijan is a historic ruined settlement near the Caspian coast, offering travelers a quiet journey into ancient urban life, c, and forgotten heritage.The post Köhnə Xudat Azerbaijan: Exploring the Forgotten Ruins of an Ancient Caspian Settlement appeared first on Travel And Tour World.

title: Laser Archaeology
description: Archaeologists are using laser scanning and magnetometry to locate ancient settlements in Greece without excavation.

title: When The Ancient Swiss Wanted To Be Beside The Seaside

title: Ilam scholar mentions ancient cities, monuments eligible for UNESCO registration
description: Habibollah Mahmoudian, PhD, is a specialist in prehistoric archaeology and a faculty member of the Islamic Azad University, Ilam Province. He has also published over 100 books as well as 200 articles in domestic and international publications.In an interview with the Tehran Times, Mahmoudian elaborated on his achievements, the western province’s history, tourism, ancient cities, and monuments that are eligible for registration on the UNESCO World Heritage List.

title: Ancient Concrete
description: A house preserved mid-renovation during the 79 CE Pompeii eruption has revealed new insights into Roman concrete.
